snippet: The $152 million Hutchinson campus, operated by Montefiore Medical Center, will send patients home the same day as part of the hospital system’s shift toward outpatient operations.
abstract: Montefiore Medical Center is set to open ambulatory facility in Bronx; complex, known as Montefiore's Hutchinson campus, will send patients home the same day as part of the hospital system's shift toward outpatient operations; though complex has the resources of a hospital, it does not have overnight beds.
lead_paragraph: The $152 million Hutchinson campus, operated by Montefiore Medical Center, will send patients home the same day as part of the hospital system’s shift toward outpatient operations.

headline.main: Montefiore’s New Bronx Medical Center Emphasizes Outpatient Care
headline.print_headline: At New Medical Center in Bronx, a Dozen Operating Rooms but No Overnight Beds
